title: Login Issues - Can't Access Account
description: Customer is unable to log in to their account. They've tried resetting their password multiple times but still encounter an error message saying 'Invalid Credentials'.

title: Payment Failed - Card Declined
description: Customer attempted to pay using Visa ending 1234 but the payment keeps failing despite sufficient balance. They've confirmed the card is active and details are correct.

title: Unable to Download Invoice
description: Customer cannot download their January invoice from the billing section. The download button appears greyed out and clicking it does nothing, though the February invoice downloaded fine.

title: Incorrect Billing Address
description: Customer's billing address shows a different city (Oldtown) than the one they updated (New City). They updated it yesterday but it still displays the old one on the 'Account Settings' page.

title: Email Notifications Not Working
description: Customer is not receiving any transactional emails, such as order confirmations or password reset links. They have checked their spam folder and confirmed the email address is correct.

title: Feature Request: Export Data to CSV
description: Customer would like to request a new feature that allows them to export their historical usage data into a CSV file format for external analysis.

title: Application Crashing on Mobile
description: The mobile application (iOS version) crashes immediately upon opening the 'Statistics' tab. This started happening after the latest app update (v3.2).

title: Subscription Cancellation Error
description: Customer is attempting to cancel their monthly subscription but receives an error message 'System Error 500' every time they click the 'Confirm Cancellation' button.

title: Duplicate Charges on Statement
description: Customer reports being charged twice for their service on 1/15/2024. Both transactions appear identical on their bank statement.

title: Broken Link on Help Center
description: The link titled 'How to Update Payment Information' in the main FAQ section leads to a 404 error page. Needs to be corrected.

title: Incorrect Display Name
description: Customer's display name is showing up as 'User123' instead of 'Katherine Harris' on their profile and in public forums, despite them updating the name in settings.

title: Slow Loading Times on Dashboard
description: The main user dashboard takes over 20 seconds to load, particularly during peak hours (10 AM - 2 PM UTC). This started occurring this week.

title: Cannot Upload Profile Picture
description: Customer is unable to upload a new profile picture. They receive a generic 'Upload Failed' message regardless of the file format or size used.

title: Question about API Documentation
description: Customer is a developer seeking clarification on the rate limiting policy for the /v2/data endpoint, as it is not explicitly mentioned in the public API docs.
